channel.title: How do i change prices of items in shop? and change ::home in a safe zone
channel.description: how do i do it ive manged to change the home on allstar scape but when ppl register they start at the old home and when i type::home it goues to my new home but its got wildy sign and can anyone tell me how i chnage the prices of things thanks :)

item.title: How do i change prices of items in shop? and change ::home in a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

As for the safezone part. Does it have a nonwild method? I know czar does.
If it does you’ll have to add the X and Y coords of all 4 corners to that method.

If it doesnt you could try to exclude the X and Y coords in your isinwild method. Like this:
!absX >= x && !absX <= x && !absY >= y && !absY <= y

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change prices of items in shop? and change ::home in a safe zone

{
            deleteItem(9540, getItemSlot(9540), 1);
            startAnimation(1816);

            teleportToY = 3863;
            txt4 = "You teleport to home";
            string4UpdateRequired = true;

item.title: How do i change prices of items in shop? and change ::home in a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

item.cfg for change price for in shop, you will see something like this:

item = 2677	Attack_cape	Its a Attack_cape	99000	99000	99000	0	0	0	0	0	9	9	9	9	9	0	0

The first 3 99000 are the prices, i’m not 100% sure which one is for in shop I think its the second

And for the ::home what base are you using ?
